alert.note: Alert for Chase (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chase County through 545 PM MDT... At 458 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Champion, or 11 miles southwest of Imperial, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wauneta, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Crete, Center Dam Campground, Area A Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Nebraska.
